title: 618 - Apple at my Core
description:
Hop in my apple cart and meet my favorite New York State apple. We’ll see a cider press and learn some facts about the fruit over gifted to teachers. (apple talk starts at about 18:10) 

You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website www.sleepwithmepodcast.com
itunes:title: Apple at my Core
itunes:subtitle: Hop in my apple cart and meet my favorite New York State apple.
